text: Bourbon Restoration may refer to: France - House of Bourbon: * Bourbon Restoration in France (1814 until 1830, after French revolution and Napoleonic era; interrupted by Hundred Days in 1815) Kingdom of the Two Sicilies - House of Bourbon-Two Sicilies: * Restoration of Bourbons (1815 until 1861, after Napoleonic wars) Spain - Spanish Bourbons: * Absolutist Restoration (1814 until 1868, after Napoleonic wars) * Restoration (Spain) (1874 until 1931, after Glorious Revolution and First Spanish Republic) * Spanish transition to democracy, which included Bourbonsâ€™ return to power
title: Bourbon Restoration
